Title: Authorizes a public employee's contractual rights extended for six months beyond expiration date of current agreement for negotiation of new agreement
Summary: Authorizes a public employee's contractual rights be extended for up to six months beyond the expiration date of such employee's agreement for the sole purpose of negotiating a new agreement.
LawCode: Amd ยง209-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to limiting the continuation of the terms and benefits coverage of an expired agreement for up to six months beyond the expiration date
